valsi.definition: location tense distance: near to ... ; there at ...; a medium/small distance from ...
unary mathematical operator: additive inverse; [- a].
zvati modal; 1st place (with thing... located somewhere)
valsi.notes: A {zvati} modal seemed like such a good idea, especially for it's second place {seva'ai} as a "with location". {seka'a} didn't really work become of the implication of direction and {tu'i} is too permanent and inalienable.

valsi.definition: convert number to scalar selbri; $x_{1}$ is at (n)th position on scale $x_{2}$.
discursive: in other words - in the same words.
discursive: in other words - in the same words.
vanbi modal, 1st place (conditions 1) under conditions ...; in environment ...
xamgu modal, 1st place beneficiary case tag complement benefiting from ...
$p_1=v_1$ protests with a sigh about $p_2$ (event/state) to audience $p_3$ with action $p_4$.
$x1=v2$ looks around
$m_1=c_1$ is the dusk of day $m_2=c_2$ at location $m_3=c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of air/normally-gaseous atmosphere of planet $x_{2}$, of composition including $x_{3}$.
$s_1$ (mass) is a dinner composed of dishes including $s_2$.
digit/number: hex digit F (decimal 15) [fifteen].
$s_1=v_1$ is a military officer in army $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ (object/event) is important/significant to $x_{2}$ (person/event) in aspect/for reason $x_{3}$ (nu/ka).
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ matters to $x_2$ in aspect/respect $x_3$. See also {banli}, {ralju}, {vamji}, {dirba}, {kargu}, {pajni}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=v_1=t_1$ is most important/most significant to $x_2=v_2$ in aspect/for reason $x_3=v_3$ among set/range $x_4=t_4$.
$f_1=v_1=t_1$ is the constitution of $f_3=v_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a word meaning/causing $x_{2}$ in language $x_{3}$; (adjective: $x_{1}$ is lexical/verbal).
$t_1=m_1$ is the tone of word $v_1=m_2$ with characteristics $t_2=m_3$.
valsi.notes: The linguistic tone is used to distinguish a difference in meaning, for example in Chinese. Cf. {valsi}, {tonga}, {morna}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (ni) is the equivalent value/worth of $x_{2}$ [item(s) of value] to $x_{3}$ for use/appreciation $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_2$ is worth $x_1$ to $x_3$; (for $x_2$ person:) $x_2$ merits (one sense), (adjective:) $x_2$ is worthy (= selva'i for reordered places); merit reward (= {nemselva'i}); receive merited reward (= {vamselne'u}); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyva'i}, {posyselva'i} for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {jdima}, {jerna}, {vecnu}, {dirba}, {janta}, {kargu}, {pleji}; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, {vajni})

valsi.definition: $v_1=t_1$ is the most valuable among items $v_2=r_4$ to $v_3$ for purpose $v_4$.
$v_1=t_1$ is the most valuable among items $v_2=r_4$ to $v_3$ for purpose $v_4$.
$x_{1}$ vomits/regurgitates $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ throws $x_{2}$ up; [violent] digestive expulsion.
$x_{1}$ (ind./mass) is part of an environment/surroundings/context/ambience of $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: (adjective:) $x_1$ is ambient. See also cmavo list {va'o}, {sruri}, {jibni}, {jbini}, {ferti}, {tcini}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is an evening [from end-of-work until sleep typical for locale] of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: This evening (= {cabvanci}); tomorrow evening (= {bavlamvanci}); yesterday evening (= {prulamvanci}). See also {cerni}, {murse}, {tcika}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is lavender of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a grape of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of wine from fruit/grapes $x_{2}$.
$j_1$ is a brandy distilled from $v_2$.
$s_1=v_1$ is vinegar made from $v_2$.
Warsaw
$x_1$ is a hovercraft for carrying $x_2$, propelled by $x_3$, riding on/lifted by $x_4$.
$x_1$ is the front of air mass $x_2$.
$mg_1$ is a fan blowing/moving air $mg_2=v_1$ to/towards/onto $mg_3$ from $mg_4$.
$mi_1$ is a fan for moving air to destination $mu_2$ from origin $mu_3$ over path/route $mu_4$.
$x_1$ is vanilla.
$x1=b2$ wafts to $x2=b3$ from $x3=b4$
$c_1$ is inflated with air.
$x1=t1$ inflates with air
$x_1$ is the atmosphere of planet $x_2=v_2$ (default Earth) of composition $v_3$.
$s_1$ is the atmospheric science of planet x2.
$x_{1}$ contains/holds/encloses/includes contents $x_{2}$ within; $x_{1}$ is a vessel containing $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: [also accommodates, container; containment need not be total; $x_2$ is Contained. in $x_1$ (= selvau for reordered places)]; See also {bartu}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {botpi}, {lanka}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ breathes/respires $x_{2}$ [gas].
valsi.notes: (though used to make the Lojban word, clue word vascular is erroneous, actually pertaining to the circulatory system that carries the respired oxygen to the tissues); See also {fepri}, {kijno}, {vacri}.

valsi.definition: elidable: end of sumti in simple bridi; in compound bridi, separates common trailing sumti.
$n_2=v_1$ has difficulty breathing gas $v_2$ under conditions $n_3$; $n_1=v_1$ pants.
$d_1$ chokes $v_1$ by/with $d_3$.
4th conversion; switch 1st/4th places.
location tense interval: a small/medium region of space.
location tense interval: the whole of space.
location tense interval: a tiny region of space.
right mathematical bracket.
location tense interval: a large region of space.
benji modal, 4th place transmit origin ...
ciste modal, 4th place as a system with synergy in ...
$x_{1}$ [seller] sells/vends $x_{2}$ [goods/service/commodity] to buyer $x_{3}$ for amount/cost/expense $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is a salesperson/salesman/vendor; $x_3$ buys $x_2$ from $x_1$ (= terve'u for reordered terms); $x_4$ is the price of $x_2$ to $x_3$ (= velve'u for reordered terms); for sale (= {fitselve'u}, {selvenfriti}); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posyve'u, posyselve'u for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {canja}, {dunda}, {janta}, {pleji}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {zarci}, {vamji}, {jdima}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {fepni}, {friti}, {jerna}, {rupnu})

valsi.definition: cusku modal, 4th place in expression medium ...
detri modal, 4th place on a date according to calendar ...
djuno modal, 4th place under epistemology ...
finti modal, 4th place creatively; created from ideas/elements ...
zgana modal, 4th place (under conditions) observed under observing conditions ...
left mathematical bracket.
$x_1=d_1=v_4$ is a signal recording and playback tape-type medium (cassette/DAT/tape drive) containing data/sound/image $x_2=v_2$ with data storage mechanism/method x3 (analog/digital)
klama modal, 4th place via route ...
$x_4=b_1$ runs on surface $x_2=b_2$ using limbs $x_3=b_3$ with gait $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ exceeds/is beyond limit/boundary $x_2=b_2$ from $x_3=b_3$ in property/amount $x_1=b_4$ (ka/ni).
$x_{1}$ is the biting tool with which $x_{2}$ is bitten at locus $x_{3}$ by $x_{4}$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a button/knob/handle on/for item $x_2=b_2$, with purpose $x_3=b_3$, made of material $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons $x_2=b_2$ directed/led by $x_3=b_3$ organized for purpose $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ transfers/sends/transmits $x_2=b_2$ to receiver $x_3=b_3$ from transmitter/origin $x_1=b_4$ via means/medium $x_5=b_5$.
$x_4=b_1$ carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo $x_2=b_2$ to $x_3=b_3$ from $x_1=b_4$ over path $x_5=b_5$; $x_4=b_1$ is a carrier/porter.
$x_4=b_1$ is a wall/fence separating $x_2=b_2$ from $x_3=b_3$, and subdividing $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ insures/indemnifies $x_2=b_2$ against peril $x_3=b_3$ providing benefit $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a wave/periodic pattern in medium $x_2=b_2$, with wave-form $x_3=b_3$, wave-length $x_1=b_4$ and frequency $x_5=b_5$.
$x_4=c_1$ is a farm/ranch at $x_2=c_2$, of rancher $x_3=c_3$ raising/producing $x_1=c_4$.
$x_4=c_1$ exchanges/trades/barters commodity $x_2=c_2$ for $x_3=c_3$ with $x_1=c_4$.
$x_{1}$ is an explanation of $x_{2}$ (event/state/property) to $x_{3}$ by $x_{4}$.
$j_4$ is the birthplace, the parent(s) being $j_2$, the birthdate being $j_3$, of $j_1$.
$x_1$ is an order [biology] with genus $x_2$, family $x_3$, with species $x_4$, within class $x_5$.
valsi.notes: From {jimca}, {jmive}, {klesi}. For biological cathegory in general (=mivyske klesi), domain (=?), kingdom (={seljimcymivykle}), phylum (={jicymivykle}), class (={xeljutsi}), order (=this definition), family (={terjutsi}), genus (={seljutsi}), species (={jutsi})

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a digging limb/tool for digging material $x_2$ up/out of $x_3$ (source/hole) with agent $x_4$.
$x_{1}=k_4$ is a route that leads to $x_{2}=k_2$, from $x_{3}=k_3$, travelled by $x_{4}=k_1$ by means $x_{5}=k_5$.
$s_4$ is a description of $s_2$ to audience $s_3$ by describer $s_1$.
$x_1$ is the time zone where $x_2$ happens on day $x_3$ at time $x_4$.
$x_1$ is jetlagged with symptoms $x_2$ going to $x_3$ from $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is the sales price of $x_{2}$ to $x_{3}$ from/at vendor $x_{4}$.
$z_3=v_4$ is the sales quota for $v_1=z_1$ to sell $v_2$ to $v_3$.
$v_1$ is the result/remnant/remainder when $v_2$ is removed/subtracted/deducted/taken away from $v_3$ by $v_4$.
zmadu modal, 4th place (relative!) more than/exceeding by amount ...
mleca modal, 4th place (relative!) less than by amount ...

$c_1$ is a market (system) interrelated by structure $c_2$ (social relations / institutions / procedures / infrastructures) of components $c_3=v_2$ (goods/services/information) displaying $c_4$ (economy).
$c_1$ is/are the sales function/activities of $c_2=v_1$ selling $v_2$ to $v_3$; $c_1$ is sales.
$x_{1}$ takes revenge on/retaliates against $x_{2}$ (person) for wrong $x_{3}$ (nu) with vengeance $x_{4}$ (nu).
valsi.notes: Also avenge; (adjective:) $x_1$ is vengeful. See also {sfasa}, {cnemu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is spring/springtime [warming season] of year $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is vernal.
$x_1=vr_1$ is a record of $x_2=ve_1$ [seller] having sold $x_3=ve_2$ [goods/service/commodity] to buyer $x_4=ve_3$ for amount/cost/expense $x_5=ve_4$, stored on medium $x_6=vr_4$.
$x_1$ is a mailer about $v_2$ from $x_3=v_1$ for audience $x_2=v_3$.
$c_1$ the direct mail business/activity/function for goods/products/services/activities $v_2$ from/by $x_3=v_1$ to audience $x_2=v_3$.
$n_1$ is an advertisement about $n_2=v_2$ by $n_3=v_1$ to intended audience $n_4=v_3$.
$c_1$ the advertising business/activity/function about goods/products/services/activities $n_2=v_2$ from/by $n_2=v_1$ to audience $n_4=v_3$.
$z_1$ is a vending machine offering $v_2$ to $v_3$ for sale cost $v_4$ under condition $z_3$.
panra modal, 4nd place (standard/geometry) similarly; similar by standard ...
pruce modal, 4th place (set of stages) passing through processing stages ...
traji modal, 4th place (set) -est; most extremely; superlative among ...
$x_{1}$ is a child/kid/juvenile [a young person] of age $x_{2}$, immature by standard $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Not necessarily human. See also {cifnu}, {makcu}, {citno}, {panzi}, {nanla}, {nixli}, se {rirni}, {bersa}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is the childhood (time of being a child) of $v_1$.
$c_1$ is a crib made of $c_2$ for a child $c_3$=$v_1$ of age $v_2$.
valsi.notes: not necessarily with bars; see also {slicka}

valsi.definition: $b_1=c_3$ is a native language of $b_2=v_1=c_1$ to express $b_3$.
tamsmi modal, 4th place similarly; sharing ideal form in property ...
valsi.notes: {tamsmi} is $x_1$ resembles $x_2$ sharing ideal form/shape $x_3$ in property $x_4$

valsi.definition: tcika modal, 4th place (for letters) as a time at location ...
location tense distance: here at ... ; at or a very short/tiny distance from ...
sumti question asking for a location: at/near what?.
dimensionality of space interval tense: 2-space interval; throughout an area.
dimensionality of space interval tense: 4-space interval; throughout a spacetime.
$c_1=v_2$ invites $ c_3=v_1$ to $v_2$ (place/event) in manner $c_4$.
dimensionality of space interval tense: 1-space interval; along a line.
vocative: wilco (ack and will comply).
dimensionality of space interval tense: 3-space interval; throughout a space.
$x_{1}$ is a/the vagina [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
$v_1=r_1$ cuts (removes during editing) $v_2=r_2$ from $v_3$ leaving $v_4$.
$v_2=l_3$ is trash/rubbish/garbage/refuse removed from $v_3=l_2$ by $v_1=l_1$ (agent)
$x_{1}$ is a video monitor/CRT/screen [machine] serving function $x_{2}$.
$s_1$ is a pixel of screen $s_2=v_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a virus of species/breed/defining property $x_{2}$ capable of infecting [at] $x_{3}$.
(adjective:) $x_{1}$ is fresh/unspoiled.
$b_1$ is an aircraft carrier carrying $b_2$, propelled by $b_3$.
$s_1$ maneuvers/pilots/is a pilot of aircraft $v_1=s_2$.
$s_1$ is a paratrooper in military unit $s_2$.
$t_1$ is an airport in transport system $t_2$ for aircraft of type $v_2$ propelled by $v_3$
$x_{1}$ [body] excretes waste $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$ via means/route $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is thick/viscous under conditions $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is mucus produced by organ/membrane $x_2$ in body $x_3$
$x_1$ is mistletoe of species/variety $x_2$.
$x1=v1=m1$ dashes to $x2=m2$ from $x3=m3$ via $x4=m4$
$m_1$ is very/extremely violent.
$t_1=v_1$ is a storm at place/region $t_2$.
$x_{1}$ removes/subtracts/deducts/takes away $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ with/leaving result/remnant/remainder $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also appropriates, confiscates; alienation is inherent. See also {lebna}, {muvdu}, {cpacu}, {canci}, {cliva}, {jdika}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=k_1$ is a loo/water closet/[room with toilet], in which $x_2=v_1$ excretes $x_3=v_2$, in home/building/structure $x_4=k_2$ surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor $x_5=k_3$ (mass/jo'u)
valsi.notes: From {vimstizu}. As distinct from {lumku'a}, which is a room that primarily features washing facilities, this is a room that primarily features a means of relieving one's self.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a toilet for $v_1$ to excrete $v_2$ from source $v_3$ via means/route $v_4$
$x_{1}$ is poisonous/venomous/toxic/a toxin to $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is an airplane/aircraft [flying vehicle] for carrying passengers/cargo $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a double bass / contrabass
$x_1$ is a viola
$x_1$ is a violin
$x_1$ is a cello

$c_1$ (mass) is a hierachical / subordinate system / tree (computer science sense) interrelated by hierachical property / property determining subordinate relationships / subordination in aspect [or organization principle] $c_2 = v_2$ (ka) among components $c_3$ displaying common property $c_4$ (ka) with leaves $v_1$ and topmost / root element $v_3$.
$k_1=v_1$ is a subsidiary company to $k_2=v_3$ chartered/mandated for purpose $k_3$.
$v_1=t_1$ is the appointed governor/governor-general/lieutenant-governor over territory $t_2$ representing principal $v_3$
$x_{1}$ is a deputy/vice/subordinate in aspect [or organization principle] $x_{2}$ (ka) to principal $x_{3}$.
$g_1=v_1$ is a state/province/canton of federal state $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ is brave/valiant/courageous in activity $x_{2}$ (event) by standard $x_{3}$.
$s_1$=$v_1$ is virology of viruses $s_2$ based on methodology $s_3$.
valsi.notes: Virology is the study of viruses. See also {vidru}, {jumske}.

valsi.definition: $f_1=v_1$ spots $f_3=v_2$ under condition $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ sees/views/perceives visually $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is visual; $x_3$ can include ambient lighting, background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that English "see" often means "look" or a more generic "observe", or even "understand, know". See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno}, {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a bison of species $x_2$
$t_1$ is an optical tool used by $v_1$ to see $v_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {viska}, {tutci}, {le'otci}, {barkalyle'o}, {darvistci}. Includes but is not limited to glass-based spectacles.

valsi.definition: $x1=v1=s1$ sees $x2=v2=s2$ under conditions $x3=v3$
$x_{1}$ is irregular/occasional/intermittent in property/action/aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a guest/visitor of $x_{2}$ at place/event $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ visits $x_{2}$/$x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is permanent/lasting/[eternal] in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$ [time-span/expectant one].
$b_1$ brings cargo $b_2$ here from $x_3=b_4$ over path $x_4=b_5$.
$x_1=b_1$ pronounces $x_3=v_1$ as $x_2=b_2$.
$c_1$ is a dictionary concerning $c_3$ authored by $c_3$ intended for $c_4$ in medium $c_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the vulva [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
$g_1$ is a verse/stanza with property (ka) $g_2$ meaning $v_2$ in language $v_3$.
$l_1$ is a line of text defined by set of words/string $l_2$ meaning $x_3=v_2$ in language $x_4=v_3$.

$x_1$ [mass/sequence] plays the Lojban word chaining game (vlalinkei) with ruleset $x_2$ and winner $x_3$ with resulting sentence $x_4$ against world champion $x_6$ for fabulous cash prize $x_7$ and endorsement deal(s) $x_8$ groupies $x_9$ (except they probably go earlier), played at time $x_10$ at location $x_11$ and honorific title $x_12$ breaking record(s) $x_13$ with mindless spectators $x_14$ taking time $x_15$ [amount] containing most frequently used word $x_16$ (zo) and not using perfectly good words $x_17$ (zo) displaying new strategy/trick $x_18$ supervised by $x_19$ with referee $x_20$ and used message transmission system $x_21$ time limit per move $x_22$ shortest move of the game $x_23$ broadcast on TV network(s) $x_24$ with Neilson ratings $x_25$ supplanting previously most watched show $x_26$ winning new fans $x_27$ who formerly played $x_28$ which is inferior for reasons $x_29$ by standard $x_30$ with banned words $x_31$ with words winning additional points $x_32$ with climax of suspense $x_33$ and best comeback $x_34$
$s_1$ is verbatim/to the letter.
$s_1=v_1$ (agent) reproaches $s_2$ for infraction $s_3$ (event/state/action)
$x_1=l_1$ is a dictionary with words $x_2=l_2=v_1$ in order $x_3=l_3$, medium $x_4=l_4$, and language $x_5=v_3$.
$t_1$ is the pattern/shape of word $v_1=t_2$ with meaning $v_2$ in language $v_3$.
$k_1$ (tool/blade/force) rips/tears/shreds $k_2$ (object) into pieces $k_3$
$x_{1}$ is an event/state/act of violence.
$x_{1}$ is a logical alternation/disjunction, stating that $x_{2}$ (du'u) and/or $x_{3}$ (du'u) is/are true.
$x_{1}$ has the power to bring about $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is powerful in aspect $x_{2}$ under $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also potent, has control/mastery. See also {tsali}, {jitro}, {ruble}.

valsi.definition: $tu_1=tr_1=v_1$ is a dictator over/in subjects/territory $tu_2$ under conditions $v_3$.
$x_1=v_1$ influences the power dynamics of situation $x_2=v_3$ towards end $x_3=v_2$ through means of influence $x_4$.
digit/number: 4 (digit) [four].
pro-sumti: repeats 1st place of main bridi of this sentence.
pro-sumti: repeats 2nd place of main bridi of this sentence.
pro-sumti: repeats 3rd place of main bridi of this sentence.
pro-sumti: repeats 4th place of main bridi of this sentence.
$x_1$ is a vodka distilled from $x_2$.
pro-sumti: repeats 5th place of main bridi of this sentence.
a rafsi for {vo'a}
valsi.notes: used in lujvo where two places refer to x1 e.g. x1 mipri x1 -RefEntity "gt" x1 vobmipri

valsi.definition: $x1=m1=m2$ hides from $x2$ by method $x3$
$x_{1}$ flies [in air/atmosphere] using lifting/propulsion means $x_{2}$.
non-veridical restrictive clause used to form complicated le-like descriptions using "ke'a".
$x_1$ is a kite.
valsi.notes: From {falnu}, {vofli} (f2, f3, v2 subsumed). See also {volfanjacta'o}.

valsi.definition: $k_1=v_1$ flies to destination $k_2$ from origin $k_3$ to destination $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5=v_2$.
number/quantity: 4,000 expressed with comma.
$x_{1}$ is a voice/speech sound of individual $x_{2}$.
voice $x_1=s_1=v_1$ of individual $x_3=v_2$ oscillates at frequency $x_2=s_2$.
$s_2$ is phonetics based on methodology $s_2$.
$k_1$ is a minimal phonological feature of language $k_2=g_2$.
$s_1$ is phonology based on methodology $s_3$.
$t_1$=$d_1$=$f_1$=$v_1$ is a board for use in water/(wind/kite)surfingboard/bodyboard/wakeboard of material/property $t_2$.
valsi.notes: From {tanbo}, {djacu}, {falnu}, {vofli} (f2, f3, v2 subsumed). See also sufingboard (={bonjacta'o}), windsurfingboard (={fanjacta'o}), wakesurfingboard (={blobonjacta'o}).

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a wombat (family Vombatidae) of species/breed $x_2$
quantified selbri: convert 4 to ordinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is fourth among $x_{2}$ ordered by rule $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a 4-dimensional spacetime/region occupied by $x_2$ .
$x_1$ is a Thursday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$d_1$ is a caltrop (tetrahedral nail) of size $d_2$ made of $d_3$.
April.
$x_1$ is April/the fourth month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$j_1$ has the rank of Lieutenant Colonel/Commander/Wing Commander (equivalent of NATO OF-4) in military unit /organization $j_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {vo}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {mumymoija'a}, {cibmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

valsi.definition: $m_1=d_1$ is the ring finger of $d_2$.
number/quantity: 40 [forty].
number/quantity: 400 [four hundred].
$x_1$ swindles $x_2$ into state/event $x_3$ by promising $x_4$; $x_1$ commits 419/advance fee fraud.
valsi.notes: generally $x_1$ is Nigerian, but may be in another country; see also {tcica}

valsi.definition: Mars.
$p_1$ is the fourth closest planet (default is Mars if p2 is the Sun) revolving around $p_2$ (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$.
$d_2$ is quadrille music accompanying dancers $d_1$ (individual, mass).
$t_2$ is four-legged with legs $t_1$.
$n_1$ is a quadrille with dancers $d_1$ to music/rhythm $d_2$.
Vorlon.
$p_1=v_1$ is a passage between $p_2=v_2$ and $p_3=v_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a doorway/gateway/access way between $x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$ of structure $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Note: emphasis on route nature; solid door (= vrogai/vrobi'u/vrozu'itci). See also {canko}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {murta}, {pagre}, {bitmu}, {kuspe}.

valsi.definition: $b_1=v_1$ is a switch/actuating lever on/for item $b_2$, with purpose $b_3$, made of material $b_4$.
valsi.notes: Though there has been a great amount of debate in Lojbanistan over the need for a lujvo as such, I thought I would submit it anyway.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a lever [tool] [of apparatus] for doing $x_{2}$ [function/action], with fulcrum $x_{3}$ and arm $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is kelp of genus/species $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is a record of $x_{2}$ (data/facts/du'u) about $x_{3}$ (object/event) preserved in medium $x_{4}$.
$p_1$ lays $p_2=v_1$ on/at surface/locus $p_3=v_2$.
$x_{1}$ lies/rests/reclines/reposes on $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is reclining/recumbent/lying on $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (set/mass/ind.) is miscellaneous/various/assorted in property $x_{2}$ (ka).
$c_1$ is liberal/open-minded with regard to beliefs $k_2$ about subject $k_3$ under conditions $c_3$
$s_1$ is a liberal political ideology as applied by $t_1=c_1$ among/in people/territory/domain $t_2$ based on the works of thinker $si_3$
$c_1=v_1$ is a French window/side-hinged window.
valsi.notes: {vorme} {canko}; typically in pairs extending to the floor

valsi.definition: $d_1$ knocks at door $d_2=v_1$ to $v_3$.
$g_1$ is a door/gate (movable barrier) in portal/doorway (opening) $v_1=g_2$ between $v_2$ and $v_3$, in structure $v_4$.
$k_1=v_1$ is the threshold defining access through the boundary between $k_2=v_2$ and $k_3=v_3$.
$l_1$ is the threshold/doorsill of doorway/gateway $l_2$ between $v_2$ and $v_3$ of structure $v_4$.
$c_1$ is a horn/buzzer/siren producing strident noise $c_2=s_1$, operated by $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is virtuous/saintly/[fine/moral/nice/holy/morally good] by standard $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Holy/saintly (= {cesyvu'e}). Virtue the attribute is "ka vrude". See also {palci}, {xamgu}, {marde}, {zabna}.

valsi.definition: $m_1=s_1$ is a squeak/creak/quiet noise to $s_2$.
$c_1$ makes/produces a rustling/crackling sound by process $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ (ka) is a taste/flavor of/emitted by $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ tastes of/like $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_2$ tastes of seasoning $x_1$, $x_1$ is a seasoned flavor of $x_2$ (= {tsapyvu'i}); vrusi may overlap the senses of taste and smell, since the latter is a significant component of taste. See also {kukte}, {tsapi}, {cpina}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ makes/produces a rich complex sound by process $c_3$.
location tense distance: far from ... ; yonder at ... ; a long distance from ...
location tense relation/direction; west of.
attitudinal modifier: virtue - sin.
attitudinal modifier: virtue - sin.
sumti qualifier: the sequence made from set or composed of elements/components; order is vague.
$z_1$ tastes $v_2$ using taste buds $z_3$ under conditions $z_4$.
joins relative clause/phrase to complete complex or logically connected sumti in afterthought.
n-ary mathematical operator: minus; subtraction operator; [(((a - b) - c) - ...)].
$vr_1=vi_1$ is a hero/heroic in doing $vi_2$ by standard $vr_2=vi_3$.
$v_1=p_1$ is fair / does justice to $p_2$ by standard $v_2$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Ukrainian language/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$v_1=b_1$ is the Ukrainian language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$g_1$ tastes $g_2=v_1$ (flavor) emitted by $v_2$.
letteral for v.
